import React from "react" function Experience() { return(

Experience

PHP Developer

Ever Innovation

Ever Innovation sells software apps and services to users in China and Japan. I’m the part of the Leadership Group, where we make critical decision from project requirement to the project deployments.

Responsible for assuring the quality and compliance of our products and quality systems; through the development, implementation and monitoring of appropriate processes. I use React, Laravel 5, Laravel, HTML, CSS, PHP 5.6 and PHP 7 and jQuery create queries for the procedures in databases. I also created rest-api for the system so other apps can access our database.

March 2017 - Present

Full Stack Developer

Bimpies

Working with management to understand the vision of the company and products, survey company personnel and proactively work through product complexities and details.

Working on Ruby on Rails API, which provide front end request from different platform like swift (iPhone App), Android App and Angular JS and deploying API on Amazon Web Services. Also developing Web-front end using Angular JS and Ruby on Rails for web application and recruitment of Bimpies team.

May 2016 - December 2016

Sr Software Developer

Redspark Technologies

Responsible for assuring the good quality and compliance of our software’s; through the development, implementation and monitoring of appropriate software development, metrics and goals.

Was in charge of CRM development team to insure the quality development and delivery of product on time with all test cases.

Developed a complete new integration of theme, templates, plugins development, worked in a team using advance level of PHP development. JOB Skill Connect: Worked as a lead programmer in this project, it’s a job portal for UK people; we used WordPress, Apache webserver, PayPal Payment Gateway and MYSQL database.

Woo-Commerce: Integrated Woo-Commerce plugin in many website for online shopping and also customizes as per requirement, In Exim-Diamond Web application I have added a complete Rap-Net data in Woo-Commerce where client need to add only Diamond detail and its whole data get filtered as per Rap-Net Data sheet.

CRM: Built a CRM for ShreedharGroup, it’s a customer support system where product distributor and customer register and resolve their system online. It’s developed in Core PHP with complete MVC structure (Model, View and Controller) and deployed in Cloud server using AWS Platform as a service.

September 2013 - July 2015
